stories.text:
The company I work for is making a push to use Code Climate but it’s unclear to me how we can use this as a team to improve the quality and quantity of work we deliver.
What’s your experience with the product and how do you use it?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you use Code Climate with your team?

stories.text:
Fees were obv. way to make money since Coinbase so that can't be it?

These companies were literally anti-crypto or not interested for years and in last years and this year they announced it a new "feature" , how is it possible that they were wrong for so long?
stories.title: What made Stripe, PayPal etc. to change view on Crypto?

stories.text:
Hi HN,

I've been unable to find a good all-in-one tool/dashboard that tracks the effects of the war (current map, economic impacts, the refugee crisis, up-to-date news stories, photo gallery, etc). I started building ukrainedashboard.com to solve this (currently an MVP).

Mostly looking for feedback on what I should add to this: what kind of information regarding the war that you wish was easier to find/keep track of? For reference, I'm in the US.

Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: What information about the war do you care about?
UK Network Operators Target iCloud Private Relay in Complaint to Regulator
